root.name: Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi
root.description: Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi is a vertical bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave and released in 2003. It runs on PGM hardware.Â Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi ExtraAn updated Xbox 360 version called Ketsui: Kizuna Jigoku Tachi Extra was released April 22 2010. It added a number of features, including a training mode, a bullet-free mode, and a special arrange mode called X-Mode.

similar_games.game: DoDonPachi Dai Ou Jou Black Label EXTRA
